mapper.sql: id, borrow_amount, total_fee_rate, borrow_interest, turst_trial, platform_licensing, collect_channel_fee, account_manager_fee, late_fee, renewal_fee, renewal_poundage, borrow_day, deal_flag, create_time, update_time, remark
mapper.insert: insert into borrow_product_config (id, borrow_amount, total_fee_rate, borrow_interest, turst_trial, platform_licensing, collect_channel_fee, account_manager_fee, late_fee, renewal_fee, renewal_poundage, borrow_day, deal_flag, create_time, update_time, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{borrowAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{borrowInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{turstTrial,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{platformLicensing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{collectChannelFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accountManagerFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{renewalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{renewalPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{borrowDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
borrow_amount,
total_fee_rate,
borrow_interest,
turst_trial,
platform_licensing,
collect_channel_fee,
account_manager_fee,
late_fee,
renewal_fee,

deal_flag,

mapper.update:
update borrow_product_config
borrow_amount = #{borrowAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_fee_rate = #{totalFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
borrow_interest = #{borrowInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
turst_trial = #{turstTrial,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
platform_licensing = #{platformLicensing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
collect_channel_fee = #{collectChannelFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
account_manager_fee = #{accountManagerFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
late_fee = #{lateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
renewal_fee = #{renewalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
renewal_poundage = #{renewalPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
borrow_day = #{borrowDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deal_flag = #{dealFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update borrow_product_config set borrow_amount = #{borrowAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_fee_rate = #{totalFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, borrow_interest = #{borrowInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, turst_trial = #{turstTrial,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, platform_licensing = #{platformLicensing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, collect_channel_fee = #{collectChannelFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, account_manager_fee = #{accountManagerFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, late_fee = #{lateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, renewal_fee = #{renewalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, renewal_poundage = #{renewalPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, borrow_day = #{borrowDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deal_flag = #{dealFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id from borrow_product_config where borrow_amount = #{borrowAmount} and borrow_day = #{borrowDay}
select count(1) from borrow_product_config where borrow_amount = #{borrowAmount} and borrow_day = #{borrowDay}

select
from borrow_product_config where deal_flag = 'n' order by borrow_day,borrow_amount

select t.id, t.borrow_amount, t.total_fee_rate, t.borrow_interest, t.turst_trial, t.platform_licensing, t.collect_channel_fee, t.account_manager_fee, t.late_fee, t.renewal_fee, t.renewal_poundage, t.borrow_day, t.deal_flag, t.remark from borrow_product_config t left join borrow_product_config t1 on t.borrow_day = t1.borrow_day and t.borrow_amount <= t1.borrow_amount where t.deal_flag = 'n' and t1.id = #{borrowProductId} order by t.borrow_amount

select t.id, t.borrow_amount, t.total_fee_rate, t.borrow_interest, t.turst_trial, t.platform_licensing, t.collect_channel_fee, t.account_manager_fee, t.late_fee, t.renewal_fee, t.renewal_poundage, t.borrow_day, t.deal_flag, t.remark from borrow_product_config t left join user_borrowquota_snapshot t1 on t1.borrow_product_id = t.id where t.borrow_day = #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t1.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1

select id, borrow_amount, total_fee_rate, borrow_interest, turst_trial, platform_licensing, collect_channel_fee, account_manager_fee, late_fee, renewal_fee, renewal_poundage, borrow_day, deal_flag from borrow_product_config where borrow_amount = #{amount} and borrow_day = #{borrowDay}
